articles.title: US moon lander Odysseus beams first IM-1 mission images - Times of India
articles.description: US News: Intuitive Machines successfully transmits first IM-1 mission images to Earth. Odysseus, the private spacecraft launched by Intuitive Machines, is carrying six experiments and technology demonstrations from NASA on its ongoing IM-1 mission.
